p:
HEV is not endemic in South Korea and is responsible for only 2% of acute viral hepatitis cases.
161 Surprisingly, the seroprevalence for anti-HEV antibody was about 17â€“34% in South Koreans, according to surveys of the general population and blood donors done between 2003 and 2009, suggesting that there are many undetected, subclinical HEV infection cases. 161, 162
